expert_traj.observation: You are in the middle of a room. Looking quickly around you, you see nothing.
You arrive at loc 29. On the sinkbasin 1, you see a apple 1, a cup 3, a fork 1, a spatula 3, a spatula 2, and a tomato 2.
You pick up the tomato 2 from the sinkbasin 1.
You arrive at loc 30. The fridge 1 is closed.
You cool the tomato 2 using the fridge 1.
You arrive at loc 17. The microwave 1 is closed.
You open the microwave 1. The microwave 1 is open. In it, you see a egg 1.
You put the tomato 2 in/on the microwave 1.
